title: Rav Schachter Criticizes Atzeres
body: Rav Hershel Schachter, rosh yeshiva at Yeshiva Rabbeinu Yitzchok Elchonon, calls the recent atzeres tefillah in Eretz Yisroel "utterly ridiculous," saying "our hashkafah is more normal." He expresses disagreement with the protest against drafting yeshiva bochurim into the army.
